collection_holder_name: School of Industrial and Labor Relations
pageContext.collection_title: Robert Louis Aronson. Associated Actors and Artists of America Merger.
pageContext.collection_description: Consists primarily of reports and supporting research materials collected for a study on the proposed merger of several performers' unions affiliated with the Associated Actors and Artists of America. The unions were: Actors' Equity Association (AEA), American Guild of Radio Artists (AGRA), American Federation of Variety Artists (AGVA), Television Authority (TVA), American Guild of Musical Artists (AGMA) and Chorus Equity Association (CEA).
